message:
Job title: C# .NET Developer.

Job type: full time

Job requirements:

• Bachelor's degree (engineering and CS are preferred)
• 1 - 3 years of proven experience with C# .NET, ASP .NET, ADO .NET, Java Script and MS SQL Server.
• Excellent understanding of OOP.
• Excellent experience with MS SQL Server 2005 - 2008 (2012 is plus) which includes the ability to write Stored Procedures, UDFs, Triggers and read entity diagrams.
• Good knowledge in Web Technologies (HTML/ XML / XSD / XSLT / XPath).
• Deep knowledge of the .NET 2.0, 3.5, 4.0, and also VS 2005, 2008, 2010.

Soft & communication skills:

• Excellent command of the English language.
• Good team player.
• Good work ethics.
• Strong Communication & Interpersonal skills.
• Strong research skills.

•• Kindly, send your resume to "Ahmed.Negm@AdvansysTelecom.com".
•• Subject your mail with ".NET Developer".
